name: Typer - Adknown Retro Games
description:
Typer is a game word game that tests your texting speed skills!

- Text the words on the enemies coming from the side to shoot your gun and eliminate them
- For every letter your fire, your score will increase
- For every enemy killed without any typing errors, your multiplier will increase -- increasing the amount of points earned per bullet fired
- As time increases: enemy word lengths, enemy spawn rate, and enemy move speed also increase!

You have 3 lives, survive for as long as you can to achieve new high scores!
